alert.note: Alert for Clay (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 8:45PM CST until February 27 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee. * WHEN...Until late Saturday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.3 feet by Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tibbee Creek Tibbee 23.0 23.7 Fri 7 pm CST 21.9 17.8 17.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1045 AM CST.
